title: Did he mean it?; Timberlake says son will 'never play football'
text:
Did he mean it?; Timberlake says son will 'never play football'   01:34 
In an off-the-cuff remark, Justin Timberlake, who will perform at Super Bowl halftime this weekend, said his three-year-old son 'will never play football' but went on to say that, ''if he wanted to get into the arts or sports, then I would fully support that''. Rough Cut
